set3.name: B.F. Sword
set3.description: +15 Attack Damage

set3.name: Recurve Bow
set3.description: +15% Attack Speed

set3.name: Needlessly Large Rod
set3.description: +20% Spell Power

set3.name: Tear of the Goddess
set3.description: +15 Mana

set3.name: Chain Vest
set3.description: +25 Armour

set3.name: Negatron Cloak
set3.description: +25 Magic Resist

set3.name: Giant's Belt
set3.description: +200 Health

set3.name: Sparring Gloves
set3.description: +10% Crit Chance and +10% Dodge Chance

set3.name: Spatula
set3.description: It must do something...

set3.name: Deathblade
set3.description: Contributing to a kill grants +25 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 1).

set3.name: Giant Slayer
set3.description: Attacks and spells deal 20% bonus damage as true damage. If enemy max Health is over 1750, deal 80% bonus true damage instead.

set3.name: Hextech Gunblade
set3.description: Heal for 45% of all spell damage dealt.

set3.name: Spear of Shojin
set3.description: After casting, wearer gains 18% of its max Mana per attack.

set3.name: Guardian Angel
set3.description: Wearer revives with 400 HP.

set3.name: Bloodthirster
set3.description: Basic Attacks heal the wearer for 45% of the damage dealt.

set3.name: Zeke's Herald
set3.description: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

set3.name: Blade of the Ruined King
set3.description: Wearer is also a Blademaster.

set3.name: Infinity Edge
set3.description: [UNIQUE] The holder gains 100% critical hit chance, and 20% bonus critical strike damage.

set3.name: Rapid Firecannon
set3.description: Attack Range is tripled and attacks cannot miss.

set3.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
set3.description: Basic Attacks grant +5% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. No stacking limit.

set3.name: Statikk Shiv
set3.description: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 90 magic damage to 3/4/5 enemies.

set3.name: Titan's Resolve
set3.description: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a 2% stacking damage bonus. Stacks up to 50 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

set3.name: Runaan's Hurricane
set3.description: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 70% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects.

set3.name: Zz'Rot Portal
set3.description: When the wearer dies, a Construct with 1500/2250/3000 ★ Health aries to continue the fight.

set3.name: Infiltrator's Talons
set3.description: Wearer is also an Infiltrator.

set3.name: Last Whisper
set3.description: Critical hits reduce the target’s Armor by 75% for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

set3.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
set3.description: Wearer's Spell Power stat is amplified by 50%

set3.name: Luden's Echo
set3.description: When the wearer casts their spell, the first target dealt magic damage and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 200 magic damage.

set3.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
set3.description: Shields allies within two hexes in the same row for 250 / 275 / 350 damage for 8 seconds (scales with wearer’s Star Level)

set3.name: Ionic Spark
set3.description: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 40% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 225% of their max Mana.

set3.name: Morellonomicon
set3.description: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

set3.name: Battlecast Armour
set3.description: Wearer is also a Battlecast

set3.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
set3.description: Each planning phase, gain one: Deal +50% more damage / Basic Attack heal 50 health on Hit

set3.name: Blue Buff
set3.description: [UNIQUE] After casting a spell, set your mana to 20.

set3.name: Frozen Heart
set3.description: Adjacent enemies lose 50% Attack Speed. (Stacking increases the radius of this effect, not the amount of the slow)

set3.name: Chalice of Power
set3.description: At start of combat, the holder and their left and right neighbors gain 30 AP for 20 seconds.

set3.name: Redemption
set3.description: When the wearer dies, allies are healed for 800 Health.

set3.name: Star Guardian's Charm
set3.description: Wearer is also a Star Guardian.

set3.name: Hand Of Justice
set3.description: Each planning phase, gain one: Deal +50% more damage / Basic Attack heal 50 health on Hit

set3.name: Bramble Vest
set3.description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 100 / 140 / 200 magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 second maximum). Scales with wearer’s Star Level.

set3.name: Sword Breaker
set3.description: 25% chance to disarm for 3 seconds

set3.name: Red Buff
set3.description: Wearer's Basic Attacks burn the target on-hit, dealing 10% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 4 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

set3.name: Rebel Medal
set3.description: Wearer is also a Rebel.

set3.name: Shroud of Stillness
set3.description: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 40% until they cast.

set3.name: Dragon's Claw
set3.description: Reduces incoming magic damage by 50%

set3.name: Zephyr
set3.description: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

set3.name: Celestial Orb
set3.description: The wearer gains the Celestial trait.

set3.name: Quicksilver
set3.description: [UNIQUE] The wearer is immune to crowd control for the first 10 seconds of combat

set3.name: Warmog's Armour
set3.description: Grants 600 health.

set3.name: Protector's Chestguard
set3.description: Wearer is also a Protector.

set3.name: Trap Claw
set3.description: Start combat with a spell shield. Stun the champion that breaks it for 4 sec

set3.name: Dark Star's Heart
set3.description: Wearer is also a Dark Star.

set3.name: Force of Nature
set3.description: Gain +1 team size.

set3.name: Thief's Gloves
set3.description: Each planning phase, fetch two temporary items, quality based upon your player level. [Consumes Three item Slots]

set4.name: B.F. Sword
set4.description: Gain Attack Damage.

set4.name: Recurve Bow
set4.description: Gain Attack Speed.

set4.name: Needlessly Large Rod
set4.description: Gain Spell Power.

set4.name: Tear of the Goddess
set4.description: Gain Mana.

set4.name: Chain Vest
set4.description: Gain Armor.

set4.name: Negatron Cloak
set4.description: Gain Magic Resist.

set4.name: Giant's Belt
set4.description: Gain Health.

set4.name: Spatula
set4.description: It must do something...

set4.name: Sparring Gloves
set4.description: Gain Critical Strike Chance and Dodge Chance.

set4.name: Deathblade
set4.description: Contributing to a kill grants the holder addtional Attack Damage for the rest of combat.

set4.name: Giant Slayer
set4.description: The holder's spells and basic attacks do bonus damage. If the target has more health, the bonus damage increases.

set4.name: Hextech Gunblade
set4.description: The holder's spells heal them for a percentage of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder.

set4.name: Spear of Shojin
set4.description: The holder's basic attacks restore Mana on-hit.

set4.name: Guardian Angel
set4.description: Prevents the wearer's first death, reviving them after a short delay and shedding all negative effects.

set4.name: Bloodthirster
set4.description: Basic attacks heal the holder for a percentage of the damage dealt.

set4.name: Zeke's Herald
set4.description: When combat begins, the wearer and nearby allies in the same row gain Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

set4.name: Sword of the Divine
set4.description: The holder gains the Divine trait.

set4.name: Infinity Edge
set4.description: [UNIQUE] Grants Critical Strike Chance. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes bonus Critical Strike Damage.

set4.name: Rapid Firecannon
set4.description: The holder gains Attack Range, and their Basic Attacks can't miss.

set4.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
set4.description: Basic Attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

set4.name: Statikk Shiv
set4.description: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals Magic Damage to nearby enemies, and true damage if they are shielded or crowd-controlled.

set4.name: Titan's Resolve
set4.description: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a stacking damage bonus. The damage stacks up to a limit, at which point the wearer gains Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

set4.name: Runaan's Hurricane
set4.description: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing a percentage of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critical strike.

set4.name: Zz'Rot Portal
set4.description: When the wearer dies, a Construct arises to continue the fight.

set4.name: Duelist's Zeal
set4.description: The holder gains the Duelist trait.

set4.name: Last Whisper
set4.description: When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced for a number of seconds.

set4.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
set4.description: The holder gains additional Spell Power.

set4.name: Luden's Echo
set4.description: When the holder casts their spell, the first target dealt magic damage and to nearby enemies are dealt additional magic damage.

set4.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
set4.description: When combat begins, the wearer and nearby allies in the same row gain a shield that blocks damage for several seconds.

set4.name: Ionic Spark
set4.description: Nearby enemies have their Magic Resist reduced. When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to a percentage of their max Mana.

set4.name: Morellonomicon
set4.description: When the holder deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing a percentage of the target's maximum Health as true damage over several seconds, and reducing healing by a percentage for the duration of the burn.

set4.name: Spirit of the Dragon
set4.description: The holder gains the Dragonsoul trait.

set4.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
set4.description: The holder's spells can cause critical hits, and the holder gains bonus Critical Strike Damage.

set4.name: Blue Buff
set4.description: [UNIQUE] After casting their spell, the wearer gains Mana.

set4.name: Frozen Heart
set4.description: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies. Each Frozen Heart a champion carries beyond the first increases the radius of this effect.

set4.name: Chalice of Power
set4.description: When combat begins, the wearer and all nearby allies in the same row gain Spell Power for the rest of combat.

set4.name: Redemption
set4.description: When the wearer dies, allies are healed.

set4.name: Mage's Hat
set4.description: The holder gains the Mage trait.

set4.name: Hand Of Justice
set4.description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer's basic attacks and spells deal additional damage or heal for a percentage of damage dealt.

set4.name: Bramble Vest
set4.description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal magic damage to all nearby enemies.

set4.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
set4.description: The holder gains Armor and Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

set4.name: Sunfire Cape
set4.description: At start of combat, and every couple seconds thereafter, a random nearby enemy is burned for a percentage of their maximum health. Any healing they receive is reduced.

set4.name: Vanguard's Cuirass
set4.description: The holder gains the Vanguard trait.

set4.name: Shroud of Stillness
set4.description: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana until they cast.

set4.name: Dragon's Claw
set4.description: Reduces incoming magic damage.

set4.name: Zephyr
set4.description: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for several seconds.

set4.name: Elderwood Sprout
set4.description: The holder gains the Elderwood trait.

set4.name: Quicksilver
set4.description: [UNIQUE] The wearer is immune to crowd control for the first several seconds of combat.

set4.name: Warmog's Armour
set4.description: Grants 600 Health.

set4.name: Warlord's Banner
set4.description: The wearer gains the Warlord trait.

set4.name: Trap Claw
set4.description: Blocks the first enemy spell that hits the wearer, and stuns the spell's caster for several seconds.

set4.name: Force of Nature
set4.description: Gain +1 team size.

set4.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
set4.description: The wearer gains the Assassin trait.

set4.name: Thief's Gloves
set4.description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.

set4.name: Anima Visage
set4.description: The wearer regenerates a percentage of their maximum Health each second.

set4.name: Death's Defiance
set4.description: A percentage of the damage the wearer receives is instead dealt over time as non-lethal damage.

set4.name: Eternal Winter
set4.description: Enemies who damage the wearer have their Attack Speed slowed for several seconds. After being slowed this way a certain number of times, the attacker is Frozen for the duration instead. An enemy can only be Frozen once every several seconds.

set4.name: Infinity Force
set4.description: Increase all stats.

set4.name: Manazane
set4.description: After the wearer casts their spell for the first time each combat, they restore Mana over several seconds.

set4.name: Obsidian Cleaver
set4.description: The wearer's attacks and spell damage shred enemy Armor and Magic Resistance by 40% for several seconds.

set4.name: Randuin's Sanctum
set4.description: At the start of combat, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the rest of combat.

set4.name: Rocket-Propelled Fist
set4.description: At the start of combat, the wearer pulls the farthest enemy into melee range, stunning them for several seconds. Allies within range will prioritize attacking that enemy.

set4.name: Gold Collector
set4.description: The wearer executes enemies below a percentage of health on hit. Executions generate 1 gold.

set4.name: Zhonya's Paradox
set4.description: The first instance of damage that would reduce the wearer below a percentage of their Health is prevented, causing them to become invulnerable for several seconds.
